TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IMethodReturnMessage implements class System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.IMessage, class System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.IMethodMessage

summary.span: 定義方法呼叫傳回訊息介面。

span.span: Defines the method call return message interface.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法呼叫傳回訊息表示訊息接收結尾處的物件上的方法呼叫的回應。A method call return message represents the response to a method call on an object at the end of the message sink. 產生的結果為遠端物件上呼叫的方法，用來傳回至呼叫端的方法呼叫的結果。An is generated as a result of a method called on a remote object, and is used to return the results of the method call back to the caller. ## Examples 下列範例程式碼顯示自訂 proxy，覆寫`RealProxy.Invoke`才能傳回的訊息資訊寫入主控台。The following example code shows a custom proxy that overrides `RealProxy.Invoke` in order to write the return message information to the console. [!code-cpp[IMethodReturnMessage_ReturnValue#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/IMethodReturnMessage_ReturnValue/CPP/imethodreturnmessage_returnvalue.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[IMethodReturnMessage_ReturnValue#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/IMethodReturnMessage_ReturnValue/CS/imethodreturnmessage_returnvalue.cs#1)] [!code-vb[IMethodReturnMessage_ReturnValue#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/IMethodReturnMessage_ReturnValue/VB/imethodreturnmessage_returnvalue.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public Exception Exception { get; }
.property instance class System.Exception Exception
Public ReadOnly Property Exception As Exception
public: property Exception ^ Exception { Exception ^ get(); };

summary.span: 取得方法呼叫期間擲回的例外狀況。

span.span: Gets the exception thrown during the method call.

value.span: 方法呼叫的例外狀況物件，或者為 ，方法沒有擲回例外狀況的話。

span.span: The exception object for the method call, or if the method did not throw an exception.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列程式碼範例顯示會 RealProxy.Invoke 覆寫要寫入所傳回的訊息資訊，包括是否方法會擲回例外狀況的自訂 proxy。The following example code shows a custom proxy that overrides RealProxy.Invoke in order to write the return message information, including whether the method threw an exception. [!code-cpp[IMethodReturnMessage_Exception#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/IMethodReturnMessage_Exception/CPP/imethodreturnmessage_exception.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[IMethodReturnMessage_Exception#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/IMethodReturnMessage_Exception/CS/imethodreturnmessage_exception.cs#1)] [!code-vb[IMethodReturnMessage_Exception#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/IMethodReturnMessage_Exception/VB/imethodreturnmessage_exception.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 雖然屬性是多餘的因為可以透過相同的功能來達成欄位和方法中，有可能是效能最佳化可用的實施者了解時，如果所有引數將會擷取。Although the property is redundant since the same functionality can be achieved through the field and method, there might be performance optimization available if the implementer understands when all the arguments will be retrieved. > [!WARNING] > 如果不`null`、擲回例外狀況時存取。If is not `null`, a exception is thrown when is accessed. ## Examples [!code-cpp[IMethodReturnMessage_ReturnValue#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/IMethodReturnMessage_ReturnValue/CPP/imethodreturnmessage_returnvalue.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[IMethodReturnMessage_ReturnValue#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/IMethodReturnMessage_ReturnValue/CS/imethodreturnmessage_returnvalue.cs#2)] [!code-vb[IMethodReturnMessage_ReturnValue#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/IMethodReturnMessage_ReturnValue/VB/imethodreturnmessage_returnvalue.vb#2)]
